1: Fill in the gap: T_E LA__ C____E (a) HAPT (b) HATT
2: How many times can you subtract the number 5 from 35? (a) SEVEN (b) FIVE
3: Meena's mother has five daughters: Reena, Teena, Sheena and Sheela. Who is the fifth daughter? (a) TEENA (b) MEENA
4: I make two people out of one.What am I? (a) MIRROR (b) SHADOW
5: What loses its head in the morning and gets it back at night? (a) MAN (b) PILLOW
6: A few sheets were torn out of a magazine: from page 3 to page 8. How many sheets were torn out? (a) THREE (b) FIVE
7: It is said that a cat has _____ lives ? (a) NINE  (b) SEVEN
